About the Company: Angels Enterprises Limited is involve in the Business of import, export, buy and sell or otherwise deal in all kind of agriculture commodities all types of food items , rice, cereals, pulses, spices, oil seeds, food grains, dry fruits, and dealing in all kind of food stuff. Angels Enterprises also carry a business as general merchants and traders in goods and commodities, commission agents, buying selling agents, and importer exporters of agro products and food stuff. Angels Enterprises Limited was originally incorporated in Union Territory of Delhi as Angels Enterprises Private Limied on 19th December, 1990.
